item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 13, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:

8. Raycast (YC W20) Is Hiring Full Stack Eng (EU, Remote, €105k-€160k) ( | hide)
9. Earth breaches 1.5 °C climate limit for the first time: what does it mean? (26 points | 8 comments)

25. Northeastern's redesign of the CS curriculum (108 points | 109 comments)
